attributes.action: Cancel all accommodation payments for the January- March university term.
attributes.additional_details:
Reasons to cancel payments: 
•Students are not permitted to leave and weren’t given to the option before lockdown started 
• overseas students have no other options of accommodation 
• people’s families can not afford financial support because of furlough
• students with roles as key workers are still needed to live in halls to go to placements 
•students have lost jobs and do not have money for all their provisions
attributes.background: The government should cancel all accommodation fees this term for students- not just those who who can’t return to campus. Student weren’t given the choice to leave.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for rent or ending a tenancy early is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
